products.name: Minimalist Furniture
products.description: Minimalist furniture emphasizes simplicity, clean lines, and a functional design. It focuses on eliminating unnecessary elements, using neutral colors, and incorporating natural materials like wood and metal. This style is often characterized by open spaces, uncluttered surfaces, and a balance between form and function, creating a calm and organized environment. Minimalist furniture is designed to be practical while maintaining an elegant, understated aesthetic.
